item.title: How does this work?
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

The Bulby attackStyle system. How does this work?

Iâ€™ve modified in action buttons.

[code] case 76:
case 79:
case 84:
case 85:
case 91:
case 92:
case 93:
switch (buttonId) {
case 2: //Chop
p.WepAttackType = 0;
break;
case 3: //Slash
p.WepAttackType = 1;
break;
case 4: //Lunge
p.WepAttackType = 2;
break;
case 5: //Block
p.WepAttackType = 3;
break;
case 10: //Special attack bar
if (!p.usingSpecial) {
p.usingSpecial = true;
p.frames.setConfig(p, 301, 1);
} else {
p.usingSpecial = false;
p.frames.setConfig(p, 301, 0);
}
break;
case 26: //Auto retaliate
if (p.autoRetaliate == 0) {
p.autoRetaliate = 1;
p.frames.setConfig(p, 172, 1);
} else {
p.autoRetaliate = 0;
p.frames.setConfig(p, 172, 0);
}
break;
}
break;

	case 81: //Weapon changes
		switch (buttonId) {
			case 2: //Chop
				p.WepAttackType = 0;
			break;
			case 3: //Slash
				p.WepAttackType = 1;
			break;
			case 4: //Lunge
				p.WepAttackType = 2;
			break;
			case 5: //Block
				p.WepAttackType = 3;
			break;
			case 10: //Special attack bar
				if (!p.usingSpecial) {
					p.usingSpecial = true;
					p.frames.setConfig(p, 301, 1);
				} else {
					p.usingSpecial = false;
					p.frames.setConfig(p, 301, 0);
				}
			break;
			case 26: //Auto retaliate
				if (p.autoRetaliate == 0) {
					p.autoRetaliate = 1;
					p.frames.setConfig(p, 172, 1);
				} else {
					p.autoRetaliate = 0;
					p.frames.setConfig(p, 172, 0);
				}
			break;
		}
	break;

    	case 78: 
    	case 82:
    	case 83:
    	case 86:
    	case 87:
    	case 88:  
    	case 89:  
		switch (buttonId) {
			case 2: //Chop
				p.WepAttackType = 0;
			break;
			case 3: //Slash
				p.WepAttackType = 1;
			break;
			case 4: //Lunge
				p.WepAttackType = 2;
			break;
			case 5: //Block
				p.WepAttackType = 3;
			break;
			case 10: //Special attack bar
				if (!p.usingSpecial) {
					p.usingSpecial = true;
					p.frames.setConfig(p, 301, 1);
				} else {
					p.usingSpecial = false;
					p.frames.setConfig(p, 301, 0);
				}
			break;
			case 26: //Auto retaliate
				if (p.autoRetaliate == 0) {
					p.autoRetaliate = 1;
					p.frames.setConfig(p, 172, 1);
				} else {
					p.autoRetaliate = 0;
					p.frames.setConfig(p, 172, 0);
				}
			break;
		}
        	break;[/code]

And in the PlayerWeapon class.

if (weapon.contains("2h") || weapon.contains("godsword") || weapon.equals("Saradomin sword")) { if (p.WepAttackType == 0) { return 7048; } else if (p.WepAttackType == 1) { return 7041; } else if (p.WepAttackType == 2) { return 7042; } else if (p.WepAttackType == 3) { return 7049; } }

Why the hell does it not work?
